titleStmt.title: The Quakers acquitted from the foul aspersions of the scandalous libeller. Being a detection of three most abusive and sordid pamphlets, entituled: I. The monstrous eating Quaker. II. The Quaker turned Jew. III. The Quaker and his maid. : Which are confuted by plain evidence to undeceive the ignorant, clear the truth and stop debauchery. / By Ellis Hookes.
titleStmt.author: Hookes, Ellis, d. 1681.

titleStmt.title: The Quakers acquitted from the foul aspersions of the scandalous libeller. Being a detection of three most abusive and sordid pamphlets, entituled: I. The monstrous eating Quaker.
